description: This file defines a data class 'Task' used as an entity for a Room database table 'tasks' in an Android application.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Data class representing a task item with fields for id, title, completion status, and timestamps; used as a Room entity.

methods.name: Task (primary constructor)
methods.description: Constructs a Task instance with default values for id, timestamps, and completion status
